other_tests.findings: Two sets of cultures of blood obtained on admission yielded acid-fast organisms.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Seven sets of cultures of blood obtained on 3 separate days yielded isolates that were identified as M. fortuitum.

other_tests.findings: Trans-thoracic echocardiography showed mild aortic insufficiency with no evidence of vegetations.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Three weeks later, repeated transthoracic echocardiography displayed peduncular vegetations on the left coronary, noncoronary, and right coronary cusps of the aortic valve.
